alert.note: Alert for South Lincoln County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 12 at 2:22PM MST until January 13 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Southwest winds gusting 40 to 50 mph. * WHERE...South Lincoln County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, particularly with strong crosswinds. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to less than 1/4 mile.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
